name: King and Pawn
description:
Explore the procedurally generated world to find and kill the enemy king.

Controls

ActionPCGamepadMoveWASDLeft StickJumpSpace BarFace BottomBackstepLeft ShiftFace RightRollLeft Shift [Double Tap]Face Right [Double Tap]Light AttackRight ShiftRight ShoulderHeavy AttackRight CTRLRight Trigger

Game Assets

Animations by Frank Climax and Game Motion ART

Chessmen Models by Robert Rodger

Climb - 2.5D Wall Movement by InfectedFury

Main Menu Music: Subtle Hints of Chaos by MistRaven

Main Level Music: Descent by Panegoism

Sound Effects by Hello Flowers (freesounds.org)
